title: Term Tender for a Combined Cargo
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Susil Premajayantha, Minister of Petroleum Industries, to enter into a term contract for the supply of petroleum products for a period of six months from 2012?12?01 up to 2013?05?31, subject to stipulated conditions, as recommended by the Special Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SSCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
